HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_GlyphCollector_Init.message: Waaahh!!! Who are you? What do you want? You've come to steal my precious merchandise?!<W 60>
Hmmm, you don't look like a thief...<E>
Hehehe, sorry. I thought you were one of those thieving Urukites from the other side of the wall.<E>
They cannot be trusted. I'm still not sure I trust you, either. If you can give me <FC 0,128,0>10 Onyx Scarabs<END FC> then I'll consider changing my mind.<E>
Ahh, beautiful! <FC 0,128,0>Onyx Scarabs<END FC>! Now, allow me to show you the fantastic merchandise I have for sale.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Farmer_CSFreed01.message: Hello again! It's great to be back on the farm with my brother again. I don't think I can thank you enough for your help.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_FarmersBrother_CSFr.message: Yes, thanks to you my brother and I can get back to our farm work.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Farmer_CSFreed02.message: For all your help, we want you to have this. We found it while farming, but it looks very valuable.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Farmer_MissMyBrothe.message: I cannot bring myself to farm while my brother is cursed in that palace. A plague on Anubis for the suffering he has caused! <E>
I've had enough of <FC 128,64,0>Heliopolis<END FC>. It used to be a great place to live, but then Anubis decided to interfere.<E>
He cursed my brother, along with everyone else in the <FC 128,64,0>Cursed Palace<END FC> over there...<E>
He made these deadly <FC 0,128,0>Eye of Ra Posts<END FC> appear in every corner of the land...<E>
He made the soil barren and infertile; I can't grow anything on the farm...<E>
Yes, it's all down to Anubis. I bet he's sitting in his tower looking down on <FC 128,64,0>Heliopolis<END FC>, laughing at all the misery and suffering.<E>
Someone should pay him a visit... teach him a lesson...<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Farmer_Reunion01.message: There you are! Thank you so much. I really can't thank you enough for freeing my brother.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Farmer_Reunion02.message: I was getting desperate. I thought I would never see him again, but thanks to you, we're reunited!<E>

There you are! Thank you so much. I really can't thank you enough for freeing my brother.

I was getting desperate. I thought I would never see him again, but thanks to you, we're reunited!

It will be great for my brother and I to get back to the farm, especially now that you've destroyed all those Eye of Ra Posts. Thanks again!
Remember, my friend, come visit us on the farm. We'll help you in any way we can...<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Farmer_KillEyes01.message: My brother and I would love to get back to our farming, but not while those deadly <FC 0,128,0>Eyes of Ra<END FC> are out there.<E>

He tells me you were responsible. I cannot thank you enough.

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Farmer_Complete.message: Now that the farm is prepared, we can relax and wait for the rains to come. Thanks for your help!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_FarmersBrother_Than.message: It's great to be back with my brother again. Once somebody gets rid of those <FC 0,128,0>Eyes Of Ra<END FC> we'll be able to get back to our farm work.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_FarmersBrother_Kill.message: Once those last <FC 0,128,0><SO HT_Objective_Temp> Eyes of Ra<END FC> are destroyed we can get back to the farm!<E>
Once that last <FC 0,128,0>Eye of Ra<END FC> is destroyed we can get back to the farm!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_FarmersBrother_AskM.message: You should speak to my brother, friend. He's in charge of the farm.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_FarmersBrother_NotD.message: It's such hard work, tilling this land. Come back later, when we're finished.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_FarmersBrother_Comp.message: It's been hard work preparing the farm, but now we can relax and wait for the rains. Thanks for your help friend!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Farmer_BrotherFreed.message: It's a miracle! My brother has returned!<E>
I have you to thank, but I cannot think how to repay you.<E>

I'll explain to you how it works. Perhaps you'll be able to help us. <E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_CreatureCollector_I.message:
Hello there! I don't believe I've seen your face around here before. Allow me to welcome you to Heliopolis.

Although it looks inhospitable here, Heliopolis is home to many different kinds of monster.

It has long been a hobby of mine to collect monster specimens from this and other worlds.
If you don't have any <FC 0,128,0>Capture Beetles<END FC> then I'm afraid you won't be able to help me.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_CreatureCollector_P.message:
I see that you have a Beetle Pouch in your possession.

Would you be interested in becoming my assistant? Yes No
Would you be interested in becoming my assistant?<N>  <B 1> Yes<N>  <B 2> No<E>

Great! Now, as my assistant I will be relying on you to help me widen my collection of monster specimens.

Take this list. When you have captured one of each monster, bring them back to me and we will discuss your payment.

Happy hunting!
Ah well, it's your loss. Assistants can earn quite a healthy living, you know.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_CreatureCollector_L.message: You don't have all the monsters on the list. Come back when you have one of each.<E>

Excellent, you have captured all the monsters on the list! Ahh, I see they are fine specimens. They will be grand additions to my collection.

Now, about your payment. These monsters were quite common so I can only offer you 100 Scarabs for their capture.

I have prepared another list of monsters for you. These are more exotic than those on the first list, and as I'm a fair man, your payment will increase accordingly.

Here's the list. Happy hunting!
Sorry, but the list is incomplete. Come back when you have one of each monster.<E>

Good work, my friend! I wasn't expecting you to complete the list so soon. I'm looking forward to adding these specimens to my collection.

As I said, this list contained some more exotic monsters. I can offer you 200 Scarabs for their capture.

On this list are monsters I've dreamt of having all my life.

In far away lands, these monsters roam free. What a magnificent site that must be!

If you can complete this list then you will have made my dreams come true. Do this and I'll reward you with my most prized possession.

Happy hunting!
You don't have all the monsters on the list. Return when you have one of each. Building up my hopes like that!<E>

......

It cannot be! You have completed the list! Yes! What magnificent specimens - this is truly a great day!

You have made me a very happy man indeed! Here, take this, my prized possession.

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_CreatureCollector_C.message: Thanks to you I have the finest monster collection in all of <FC 128,64,0>Heliopolis<END FC>!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_GlyphCollector_Intr.message:
You shouldn't sneak up on people like that! I thought you were trying to steal my precious merchandise!

In fact, I'm still not sure I fully trust you. If you can give me 10 Onyx Scarabs then I might change my mind.
<FC 0,128,0>Onyx Scarabs<END FC> used to be commonplace, but these days they are very rare and quite valuable.<E>
You got it! My favorite <FC 0,128,0>Glyph<END FC>! Now I think I can trust you. Please browse fantastic merchandise I have for sale.<E>
I only accept <FC 0,128,0>Onyx Scarabs<END FC> as payment. Rumor has it a mysterious man is hoarding them in his castle in the depths of <FC 128,64,0>Uruk<END FC>.<E>
I only accept <FC 0,128,0>Onyx Scarabs<END FC> as payment.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_GlyphCollector_Prom.message: Aha! Can I have the <FC 0,128,0>10 Onyx Scarabs<END FC>?<N>  <B 1> Yes<N>  <B 2> No<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_GlyphCollector_Acce.message: Excellent! Now I think I can trust you. Look at the fantastic merchandise I have for sale!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_GlyphCollector_Decl.message: Suit yourself, but you'll never know what exotic merchandise I have for sale. Ha!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Trader_Intro01.message:
Welcome, young traveler! It is good to see a new customer around here. Business has been pretty slow recently.

I don't have much in stock at the moment but you may find something that interests you.

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Trader_General01.message: You won't find better deals anywhere else!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Athlete_Intro01.message:
Greetings! It's good to see a fellow athlete around these parts, although I must admit that your physique isn't anywhere near as impressive as mine.

As is quite plain to see, my body is an impeccably functioning machine, honed to perfection by years of hard training.

I can run from here to the end of the next beach and back in less than 70 seconds.

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Athlete_Prompt01.message: Do you think you can beat my time?<N>  <B 1> Yes<N>  <B 2> No<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Athlete_Prompt02.message: Do you want me to explain the rules?<N>  <B 1> Yes<N>  <B 2> No<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Athlete_Decline01.message: Ahh, a man who knows his limits. Come back later if you think you can better my time.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Athlete_Accept01.message:
Very well. Good luck, kid! You're gonna need it!

Ready...

Set...

Go!

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Athlete_Rules01.message:
You must run from here to the hanging pendant, suspended on a ledge, at the end of the next beach and back again in less than 70 seconds.

So I can be sure you aren't cheating you must hit the pendant with your blade before running back.

When you get back, talk to me and I will stop the timer.

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Athlete_TimeSlow01.message: Well you managed to do it in <FC 0,128,0><SO HT_Objective_Hel_Exterior_AthleteTime> seconds<END FC>. Not bad, but as I expected still not as quick as me.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Athlete_TimeSame01.message: Wow, you did it in <FC 0,128,0><SO HT_Objective_Hel_Exterior_AthleteTime> seconds<END FC>. That's the same as my best time. Pretty impressive! You'll have to beat my time to really impress me, though.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Athlete_TimeFast01.message:
What?! You're back already?! You only took seconds! That's amazing!

Seeing as you've beaten my time so convincingly I'll concede to the better athlete. Here, take this. It has kept me fit, strong and healthy for as long as I can remember.

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Athlete_TimeVoid01.message: If you didn't hit the hanging pendant with your blade, then I can't accept your time. Sorry!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Athlete_TimeVoid02.message: Do you think I am blind?! I saw you use the boat! If you aren't going to attempt the challenge properly then begone!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Athlete_Complete01.message: Your time was amazing! I guess I'll have to train harder if I'm going to better it. At least I have another goal, I suppose.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Obstacle_Prompt01.message:
Aha! At last someone in good physical condition to take on my obstacle course!

I've been training for many years, perfecting my line through the course. I'm certain I have an unbeatable time.

Reckon you've got what it takes to beat my time? Yes No

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Obstacle_Prompt02.message: So, you think you have what it takes to beat my time?<N>  <B 1> Yes<N>  <B 2> No<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Obstacle_Decline01.message: A wise man knows when he's beaten. Still, come back if you change your mind.<E>

The rules are simple; you must get to the shrine at the end of the course as fast as you possibly can.

If you fall from the course and land in the sea, you have failed.

Good luck, there's no doubt you'll need it!

Ready...

Set...

Go!

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Obstacle_MidRace01.message: What are you chatting to me for?! The clock is ticking...<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Obstacle_TimeSlow01.message:
Back again at last, eh? What took you so long? seconds is a pretty pathetic time, my friend.

You should come back when you've worked out a bit more!

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Obstacle_TimeSlow02.message:
Not quick enough, I'm afraid.

You managed it in seconds and your best time is seconds.

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Obstacle_TimeMedium.message:
Not bad, seconds. Obviously not as fast as my record time.

With more training I'm sure you can do better.
Well, you managed to equal your record time of <FC 0,128,0><SO HT_Objective_Hel_Exterior_ObstacleTime> seconds<END FC>. That's going to be a tough time to beat.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Obstacle_TimeFast01.message:
Eh what?! How can you be back already? You must have cheated! seconds, that is amazing!

Such a time deserves a reward. Here, take this; may it bring you good health on your journey.

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Obstacle_TimeFast02.message: Excellent! <FC 0,128,0><SO HT_Objective_Hel_Exterior_ObstacleTime> seconds<END FC> is a new record! That time is going to take some beating.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Obstacle_TimeVoid01.message: Sorry, but you ended up in the sea, so you failed to beat my time. Dry yourself off and try again if you like.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Swimmer_Prompt01.message:
Ahoy there! You look like someone who relishes a physical challenge - an important attribute in these dark and dangerous times.

I am the best swimmer in Heliopolis. I'm definitely better than all those weaklings from Abydos.

I've perfected my technique on a training course in the sea, between South Beach and Sun Shrine Island.

Do you think you can complete my training course? Yes No

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Swimmer_Prompt02.message: Reckon you can complete my training course?<N>  <B 1> Yes<N>  <B 2> No<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Swimmer_Prompt03.message: Very well. Would you like to hear the rules?<N>  <B 1> Yes<N>  <B 2> No<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Swimmer_Prompt04.message: You think you can go faster than <FC 0,128,0><SO HT_Objective_Hel_Exterior_SwimmerTimeBest> seconds<END FC>?<N>  <B 1> Yes<N>  <B 2> No<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Swimmer_Decline01.message: You've probably saved yourself some embarrassment, my friend. Come back if you change your mind.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Swimmer_Rules01.message:
The rules are simple: there are a series of checkpoints in the ocean which you must swim through.

The checkpoints will only stay active for a limited time, so you must reach them before they deactivate.

When you pass through a checkpoint, the next one will activate.

If you do not reach a checkpoint before it deactivates, then you've failed.

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Swimmer_Start01.message:
Wishing you luck seems pointless, but good luck anyway!

Ready...

Set...

Go!

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Swimmer_TimeSlow01.message:
My, you did take your time! seconds is a touch on the slow side, friend!

Your best time is still seconds.

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Swimmer_TimeMedium0.message: Well you managed to equal your record time of <FC 0,128,0><SO HT_Objective_Hel_Exterior_SwimmerTime> seconds<END FC>. Given how tired you look, that'll be tough to beat.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Swimmer_TimeFast01.message: Excellent! <FC 0,128,0><SO HT_Objective_Hel_Exterior_SwimmerTime> seconds<END FC> is a new record! That time is going to take some beating. Surely a fluke!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Swimmer_TimeReward0.message:
Ahh, very impressive my friend! Few people have what it takes to complete my training course.

Because you managed to complete the course in only seconds, I want you to take this gift.

An Abydosian swimmer gave it to me a long time ago. Of course, I never use it. I can swim fast enough without the aid of silly magical trinkets.
If you want to try the course again and attempt to beat your time, then let me know.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Swimmer_TimeFailed0.message: Hahaha! I knew my course would be too much for you. Come back when you've done some more training, friend.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_NomadHusband_Normal.message: Greetings! Welcome to <FC 128,64,0>Heliopolis<END FC>. Allow me to introduce you to my beautiful wife, Ketta.<E>
Strange things have been going on recently, I just wish <FC 128,64,0>Heliopolis<END FC> was how it used to be.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_NomadHusband_WifeGo.message: Ketta! Ketta! Where are you? What am I going to do? My wife has gone missing!<E>
I awoke this morning and she was gone! Oh dear! Something bad has happened to her! I can feel it!<E>
I thought I heard her voice in this building, but I'm too afraid to go inside. Curse my cowardice!<E>

Please, go inside and rescue her. I'm begging you!

Heliopolis has become such a terrible place. Monsters everywhere, people cursed and cast into stone and now my poor Ketta! Please, help me!
Please, find my wife! You're a stranger to me, but where else can I turn? <E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_NomadHusband_WifeBa.message: The hero has returned! You rescued my wife! How can I ever repay you?<E>
I didn't realize when we first met that you were an apprentice of our friend Imhotep. He said that he wants to speak with you in the <FC 128,64,0>Sun Shrine<END FC>.<E>
He also asked me to give you this. He seemed to think it would prove to be useful in your quest.<E>
It brings tears of joy having Ketta back home. Thanks again, stranger. Thank you!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_NomadWife_Normal01.message: My husband is worried about <FC 128,64,0>Heliopolis<END FC>. I can't blame him. It has become a dark, oppressive place.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_NomadWife_Normal02.message: Even so, I'm sure <FC 128,64,0>Heliopolis<END FC> will return to normal soon.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_NomadWife_Trapped01.message:
At last, someone to rescue me! Please, you must find a way to deactivate this force field!

I'm sure those three colored beams are powering the force field. If you could find a way to deactivate them, I might be able to escape!

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_NomadWife_Back02.message: I will never forget what you've done for me, stranger. You have a place in my heart.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_SquirtHerd_Intro01.message: Hello there! Say, are you one of those adventurers in search of treasure and the like?<N>  <B 1> Yes<N>  <B 2> No<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_SquirtHerd_Intro01A.message: Ahh... I thought so, you look the type.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_SquirtHerd_Intro01D.message: Well, looks can be deceiving I guess. I'm a Squirt Herdsman, but you wouldn't know it to look at me.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_SquirtHerd_Prompt01.message:
So Mr. Adventurer, I'll make you an offer. I have a nice shiny piece of treasure here that I'm sure you would find very interesting.

If you can help me by herding my Squirts back into the pen here, then I'll give you this piece of treasure.

So do you accept my offer? Yes No
Excellent! Round up the Squirts and come back and talk to me when you've finished.<E>
Ahh well... I guess I'll have to keep my nice shiny piece of treasure to myself.<E>

So will you help me? Yes No
Excellent! Round up the Squirts and come back and talk to me when you've finished.<E>
Ahh well... I guess I'll have to keep my nice shiny piece of treasure to myself.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_SquirtHerd_Squirts0.message: There are still <FC 0,128,0><SO HT_Objective_Hel_Exterior_SquirtHerdSquirtsLeft> Squirts<END FC> out there my friend!<E>
There is still <FC 0,128,0><SO HT_Objective_Hel_Exterior_SquirtHerdSquirtsLeft> Squirt<END FC> out there my friend!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_SquirtHerd_Reward01.message: You did it! All my Squirts are safely back in their pen thanks to you, stranger. Here take this, you deserve it.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_SquirtHerd_Done01.message: My Squirts are doing great, my friend! One day I'm going to build a Squirt Ranch where I can keep hundreds of the little guys.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_SquirtHerd_Done02.message: Thanks for your help stranger. My Squirts are doing great now.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Ext_Horus_WallEntrance1.message: Sphinx, there you are! I knew that we would meet again. As you can see, I heroically managed to survive in <FC 128,64,0>Uruk<END FC>. Well, I won't bore you with the details.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Ext_Horus_WallEntrance2.message: You got lucky in <FC 128,64,0>Uruk<END FC> and by rights that blade should be mine! You would never have found it without my help!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Ext_Horus_WallEntrance3.message: Yet again you credit yourself with greater skill than you possess. You can't get up here; you don't have the power to jump high enough! Your weakness is pathetic.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Ext_Horus_WallEntrance3a.message: I found Imhotep in the temple on <FC 128,64,0>Sun Shrine Island<END FC>. That crazy old fool told me he was looking for you.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Ext_Horus_WallEntrance4.message: As you can see, you can't even get inside! I will solve the problem that Anubis has created by myself, despite what Imhotep says. See you around!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Ext_Horus_Invisibility01.message: Sphinx, I hear you have convinced Anubis to free some of the people of the <FC 128,64,0>Cursed Palace<END FC>...<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Ext_Horus_Invisibility02.message: I hate to admit it, but I was wrong about you. I admire your bravery and compassion for those poor people.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Ext_Horus_Invisibility03.message: You've proved yourself my equal. In demonstration of my good will, I have decided to give you a present.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Ext_Horus_Invisibility04.message: This is no ordinary gift. It is the <FC 0,128,0>Dark Stone of Invisibility<END FC>. It grants the power of invisibility to any person that uses it.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Ext_Horus_Invisibility05.message: I am sure it will be very useful in your future quests. I hope you can forgive my arrogance towards you in the past. I apologize, Sphinx.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Ext_Horus_Invisibility06.message: Don't use it! It's a trap!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Ext_Horus_Invisibility07.message: That really is the <FC 0,128,0>Dark Stone of Invisibility<END FC>, but the power of invisibility has a nasty side effect: it causes instant death!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Ext_Horus_Invisibility08.message: Of course! Tutankhamen would be able to use it without danger to himself!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Ext_Horus_Invisibility09.message: Keep the stone for now. We will send it to our friend the Mummy when we get the opportunity.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Ext_Horus_Invisibility10.message: I am afraid you must not trust Horus any further. Jealousy of your achievements has clearly affected his judgment. Who knows his true motives?<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Ext_Horus_Invisibility11.message: Perhaps his survival in <FC 128,64,0>Uruk<END FC> was not simply a matter of good fortune...<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_DuckBeliever_Second.message: Only the One of the Prophecy will be able to unlock the secret of the Great Obelisk.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_SlyBeliever_SecondV.message: The Great Obelisk will only reveal its secret to the One of the Prophecy.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_ToothyBeliever_Seco.message: Inside the Great Obelisk is an item of great importance to the One of the Prophecy.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_SquashBeliever_Seco.message: The One of the Prophecy will conquer the <FC 128,64,0>Lost Temple of Heliopolis<END FC>, translate the text of the Ancients and discover the secret of the Great Obelisk.<E>

HT_Text_HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_DuckBelieve.message: You have deciphered the ancient texts on the Obelisk. Are there are any more Obelisks that can be deciphered?<E>

HT_Text_HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_SlyBeliever.message: It is true! You are the One. I am truly honored to be in your presence.<E>

HT_Text_HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_ToothyBelie.message: You must be the one who has come to save <FC 128,64,0>Heliopolis<END FC> and the old kingdoms!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_SquashBeliever_Obel.message: The Gods have sent a messenger! We will pray for you, Chosen One.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Basket_Obelisk.message:
Hello again, Sphinx! I have some important information from Imhotep.

He is pleased with your progress and with the artifact that I have here; the Hands of Amun. He sees that you are ready to begin your search for the Sacred Crown of Uruk.

He believes that the crown may be in Uruk Islands and that you will need to gain access to Great Wall Entrance III to get there.

HT_Text_Hel_Exterior_Help_GotAbydosID.message:

This official document gives unlimitedaccess to the city of Abydos!

HT_Text_Hel_BedouinOutpost_Archeologist_.message: You have done it! You have translated the <FC 0,128,0>5 Golden Obelisks of Heliopolis<END FC>!<E>
This message is incredible! The Ancients foresaw that darkness would descend upon us, and inscribed the <FC 0,128,0>Ancient Prophecy of Ra<END FC> on the Obelisks...<E>

When the Age of Osiris comes to an end, the Shadow of Set will descend upon us...

but a great warrior by the name of Sphinx, will emerge as the Chosen One, to defend the Eternal Eye of Ra.
It is you! You are the Chosen One! I don't know what to say.<E>

I want you to take this to help you on your quest. It is a magical statue which is said to unlock the Great Obelisk on the cliffs above South Beach.

You must succeed in your quest. The fate of all lies in your hands. Good luck, great warrior!
The word of the Ancients is inscribed on <FC 0,128,0>Golden Obelisks<END FC> throughout <FC 128,64,0>Heliopolis<END FC>. I have always wondered what our ancient ancestors recorded in those texts.<E>

Ahh, I see you have translated some of the Golden Obelisks!

Hmm... this looks like it could be a very prophetic message. You should translate the rest of the Obelisks to find out what the Ancients had to say.
You must succeed in your quest. Our fate lies in your hands!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_BedouinOutpost_BeetleBreeder.message:
Welcome, stranger! If you are a connoisseur of fine Capture Beetles, then you have come to the right place!

I stock only the very best in trained beetles, guaranteed to go exactly where you desire.

Feel free to browse my stock.

Although I have plenty of stock at the moment, I fear that may change in the near future.

It's my special Beetle Breeding Jar, you see It went missing several days ago.

If I don't get it back soon, I won't be able to breed any more beetles. I could go out of business!

You look like you do plenty of traveling, so if you happen to find my Beetle Breeding Jar, please bring it back to me.
There is still enough stock to keep the shelves full, but that won't last long.<E>

My Beetle Breeding Jar! I can't believe you found it!

Now I'll be able to get busy building up my stock again! How can I possibly repay you?

Take this Loyalty Card, it entitles you to half price beetles every time you visit my store.

Thanks again, stranger!
Welcome back, valued customer. Remember, your <FC 0,128,0>Loyalty Card<END FC> entitles you to a 50% discount on all beetles!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_BedouinOutpost_Healer_Intro0.message:
Greetings! It's always nice to see a new face around here. We rarely get any visitors.

I am Shetta, the local healer of the Bedouin Outpost. I am quite skilled in ancient healing incantations and rituals.

HT_Text_Hel_BedouinOutpost_Healer_Prompt.message: What brings you to our outpost today?<N>  <B 1> Healing<N>  <B 2> <FC 0,128,0>Ankh Piece<END FC> Ritual<N>  <B 3> Nothing in particular<E>

HT_Text_Hel_BedouinOutpost_Healer_Healin.message: I can bring you back to full health for <FC 0,128,0>50 Scarabs<END FC>.<N>  <B 1> Heal me<N>  <B 2> Never mind<E>
There! You have been revitalized! I'm sure you feel the vigor of life pulsing through you!<E>
You are healthy enough without my powers!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_BedouinOutpost_Healer_AnkhPr.message: I will need <FC 0,128,0>4 Gold Ankh Pieces<END FC> for the ritual.<N>  <B 1> OK<N>  <B 2> No way<E>
The ritual costs <FC 0,128,0>200 Scarabs<END FC><N>  <B 1> OK<N>  <B 2> No way<E>

HT_Text_Hel_BedouinOutpost_Healer_AnkhCo.message: Done! Your <FC 0,128,0>Gold Ankh Pieces<END FC> have been reformed!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_BedouinOutpost_Healer_AnkhNo.message: Sorry, but I need <FC 0,128,0>4 Gold Ankh Pieces<END FC> to perform the <FC 0,128,0>Ankh Piece<END FC> Ritual.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_BedouinOutpost_Healer_Generi.message: As you wish. Come back if you change your mind.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_BedouinOutpost_Healer_NotEno.message: Sorry, but you don't have enough <FC 0,128,0>Scarabs<END FC>.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_BedouinOutpost_Hippy_MyLife.message:
Hi there! I didn't expect to see you around these parts. I guess you like to travel around a lot, just like me.

I like to come here to Heliopolis now and then, just to chill out on the beach.

The only problem is that it's far too hot and sunny to lie around out there right now.

HT_Text_Hel_BedouinOutpost_Hippy_ItemPro.message: Hey! A <FC 0,128,0>Parasol<END FC>! Can I have it to shade me from the sun?<N>  <B 1> Yes<N>  <B 2> No<E>

HT_Text_Hel_BedouinOutpost_Hippy_ItemDec.message: Aww, man! Way to bring me down!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_BedouinOutpost_Hippy_TooSunn.message: Aww, man! It's still too sunny to rest on the beach.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_BedouinOutpost_Hippy_Thanks1.message: In return, you can take this <FC 0,128,0>Scarab Bag<END FC> if you want. I have no use for it now.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_BedouinOutpost_Help_AnkhIncr.message:
You got a Gold Ankh Piece!

Collect more Gold Ankh Pieces to further increase your health capacity.

HT_Text_Hel_BedouinOutpost_Help_GotLoyal.message:
You got the Loyalty Card!

This card entitles the owner to half price beetles from the Bedouin Outpost store.

HT_Text_Hel_BedouinOutpost_Complete1a.message: Oh my goodness! I can't believe it! I deciphered the <FC 0,128,0>Rosetta Stone<END FC>!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_BedouinOutpost_Complete1b.message: I did it, my friend! Finally, after all these long years, I have realized my dream! I couldn't have done it without you! You've made an old man very happy.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_BedouinOutpost_Complete1c.message:
Please, take the reassembled stone as a gift. You can use it to decipher the 5 Golden Obelisks of Heliopolis!

Once you’ve deciphered the 5 Obelisks, you must return and let me know what you’ve found.

I’m far too old to search for them myself, but I am extremely interested in what you will discover!

Don't forget, you can keep track of your findings in your notes. Good luck!

HT_Text_Hel_BedouinOutpost_Wait1a.message: I still need time to assemble the pieces. <E>

HT_Text_Hel_BedouinOutpost_Wait1b.message: Just go, I need to concentrate! <W 25>

HT_Text_Hel_BedouinOutpost_Breeder_First.message: Greetings, traveler! Welcome to our humble <FC 128,64,0>Bedouin Outpost<END FC>.<E>
If you are a connoisseur of fine <FC 0,128,0>Capture Beetles<END FC> then you have come to the right place.<E>
Browse my stock while you still can. If I don't find my <FC 0,128,0>Beetle Breeder Jar<END FC> soon there won't be any beetles left to buy!<E>

Years ago, I fell through a strange portal and got stuck in this world. Not that I mind though.

Now I can concentrate on my hobby of collecting and breeding beetles.

I used to have a collection of rare remote control explosive breeder beetles, but a few weeks ago a sandstorm came and blew them away, along with my spare Beetle Satchel. Ah well, life goes up and down!

HT_Text_Hel_BedouinOutpost_Help_GotBeetl.message:
You found the Beetle Breeder Jar!

The Beetle Breeder in the Bedouin Outpost will be very happy to see this.

HT_Text_Hel_BedouinOutpost_Help_GotRoset.message:
You got the Rosetta Stone!

This ancient tablet allows you todecipher the text of the Ancients!

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_PalaceGuard1_Do.message: Go on through. The Pharaoh has been expecting you.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_PalaceGuard2_Do.message: Do not keep the Pharaoh waiting.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_PalaceGuard1_Do.message: I cannot believe I was fooled by that traitor!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_PalaceGuard2_Do.message: If that creature was an impostor, then what has become of our real Pharaoh?<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_FortuneTeller_P.message: I foresee that you will cross my palm with <FC 0,128,0>30 Scarabs<END FC><N>  <B 1> Very well<N>  <B 2> No way<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_FortuneTeller_A.message: Excellent, now I shall predict the location of a long lost <FC 0,128,0>Gold Ankh Piece<END FC>...<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_FortuneTeller_D.message: Strange... my powers of prediction seem somewhat inaccurate today.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_FortuneTeller_N.message: Sorry, but you don't have enough <FC 0,128,0>Scarabs<END FC>.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_FortuneTeller_A.message: The outlook is unclear... I'm afraid I cannot foresee the locations of any more <FC 0,128,0>Gold Ankh Pieces<END FC> at the moment. Try again later and I may be able to help.<E>
Unless my powers deceive me, I do believe that you have found all the ancient <FC 0,128,0>Gold Ankh Pieces<END FC>! Truly amazing!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_Scribe_WakeUp1a.message: What the...? What is this strange place?<W 30>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_Scribe_WakeUp1b.message: Wah! You surprised me there, stranger!<W 30>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_Scribe_WakeUp1c.message: I was summoned from <FC 128,64,0>Abydos<END FC> to write the Pharaoh's autobiography, when I started to feel ever so sleepy. Next thing I know, here I am with you.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_Scribe_WakeUp1d.message: These strange events have given me a great idea for a gripping new book! I'm going back to <FC 128,64,0>Abydos<END FC> immediately to start work on it.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_Scribe_WakeUp1e.message: Thank you for your help stranger, take this book of mine as a gift. When you're in <FC 128,64,0>Abydos<END FC>, don't hesitate to drop by for a chat. Toodle-pip!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_Help_GotBookOfT.message:
You got the Book of the Dead!

With this ancient tome you can summon Bas-Ket totransport Canopic Vases to the Mummy!

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_Mother_WakeUp.message:
What happened? Oh! My precious doggies are gone!

Please sir, you must help me! The last thing I remember is my doggies turning nasty and attacking me! Why would they do that?!

They seem to have run off now, but if you could find them for me I would be most grateful.

Be careful though. They were, shall we say, ill tempered when I last saw them...

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_Mother_DogsAllS.message: If you find my doggies please send them back to me, I'm ever so worried.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_Mother_DogsStil.message: Some of my precious doggies have returned but <FC 0,128,0><SO HT_Objective_Hel_CursedPalace_MotherNumChihuahuasLeft><END FC> are still missing. Oh, I do hope they're alright!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_Mother_DogsOneS.message: Some of my precious doggies have returned but <FC 0,128,0>1<END FC> is still missing. Oh, I do hope he is alright!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_Mother_DogsAllF.message:
Thank you ever so much! All my doggies have returned so I can finally stop fretting.

Please, take this. You should run a kennel!

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_Mother_ThanksAg.message: Thank you again for rescuing all my poor, cute doggies. Who would do such a thing to innocent creatures?<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_PharaohsWife_Wa.message:
Oh my! How disorientating!

The last thing I remember is my husband the Pharaoh behaving in a most peculiar way.

He was obsessed with the construction of a tower beyond the Great Wall.

He became quite short tempered and aggressive. I do hope he's feeling better now.

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_PharaohsWife_St.message: My dear Pharaoh! I do hope he is in good health.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_PalaceGuard1_Wa.message:
Grrr! What kind of devilry was that?

The last I remember is the Pharaoh being very keen on security. Looks like he had every reason to be cautious.

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_PalaceGuard1_Go.message: You cannot see the Pharaoh without an <FC 0,128,0>Invitation<END FC>.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_PalaceGuard1_Op.message: I see you have an <FC 0,128,0>Invitation<END FC>. The Pharaoh will gladly see you.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_PalaceGuard2_Wa.message:
Curses! What in the name of Ra was that?

Maybe the Pharaoh was right to encourage tighter palace security.

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_PalaceGuard2_Go.message: Strictly no visitors without an <FC 0,128,0>Invitation<END FC>.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_PalaceGuard2_Op.message: Yes, your <FC 0,128,0>Invitation<END FC> appears to be in order, go on in.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_CursedPharaoh_W.message:
No! I will not let my Master's plans falter because of you!

Try to interfere and I will destroy you like the insect that you are!

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_FarmersBrother_.message:
Huh? Ohhh! Thank you for lifting the curse!

I'd better be off now.

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_CursedPharaoh_B.message:
Arghhhh! Destroyed by a mere child!

I am defeated for now, but you have made a very grave mistake this day; you have interfered with the plans of the almighty Set.
His fury will cause the earth to tremble, the skies will be scorched, and the hearts of all living things will wither in terror.<E>
In my final moments of life, I take pleasure in the fact that a slow, excruciatingly painful death is all that you have to look forward to.<E>
Well, I have to admit, you are a persistent one. However, that persistence will not get you this crown.<E>

I will not let it fall into hands as ignorant as yours. You will never understand its power!

Anubis tried to take the crown from me before, but he failed. He was forced to cast me into stone for eternity.

It was all he could do to stop me. Now he sends you, his little puppet, to take it from me.

He must be getting old and senile, festering away in that tower. Muahahahaha!!
I shall return this crown to my Lord Set...<E>
Killing me is the only way you will ever get your hands on the crown!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_FarmersBrother_.message: Ungh! Huh? What is going on here? Where am I?
Wait a minute, this is the <FC 128,64,0>Pharaoh's Palace<END FC>. How in the world did I get here?<E>

Of course! I was called to work on the Palace Gardens! I don't recognize any of these other people though...

I thought the Pharaoh had banned all visitors... I wonder how he will feel when he sees all these stone people everywhere.
Anyway, I should get back to the farm and find my brother, he must be very worried about me. Thanks for freeing me, my friend.<E>
You should come by the farm, it is just up the hill outside here. Come and see us and we'll help you if we can.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_FortuneTeller_W.message: Wha? Where? Ahh, greetings young fellow. I foresaw that you would be the one to free me from the curse.<E>
My skills of prediction are well known throughout <FC 128,64,0>Abydos<END FC>, but even I could not see the approach of the curse that trapped me here.<E>
The Pharaoh's Wife summoned me to perform a prediction, but then... Wait a moment. Ahhhh, I can see something...<E>
<FC 128,64,0>Heliopolis<END FC> was once a bright and peaceful place...<E>
...then things began to change, the days started to get shorter and the nights became longer...<E>
...strange monsters began to appear in the hills to the far north...<E>
...the climate changed; volcanoes began to stir within the mountains; the earth began to crack spilling lava from beneath...<E>

...but then a most mysterious thing occurred.

As dawn broke and the people of Heliopolis rose to face another day, they saw something they could not believe nor understand...

...a monumental wall had appeared across the entire length of Heliopolis.

They were stunned by its appearance but also thankful. This wall was apparently built to protect them from the turmoil in the north.
Alas, there was a twist in the tale. The wall was built, but the inhabitants of the <FC 128,64,0>Pharaoh's Palace<END FC> were cursed and cast into stone.<E>
This was the heavy price to pay for the protection of the wall.<E>
From that point on, this place became known as the <FC 128,64,0>Cursed Palace<END FC>.<E>

Ahhhh, I also see many interesting things in your future...

I see that you are seeking a lost sacred crown...
...I see an ancient lost temple, hidden amongst the sands of a great desert...<E>
...I see <FC 0,128,0>Golden Obelisks<END FC> with a secret hidden within... <E>
...and I see a feat of great strength. <E>
That is all I can see for the moment, young fellow. Now I must return home to <FC 128,64,0>Abydos<END FC>. I foresee that we will meet again in the distant future. Goodbye.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_PalaceGuard1_Wa.message: Argh! What devilry was that?! What's going on here?<E>
I thank you stranger for freeing me, but I'm afraid I cannot allow you to see the Pharaoh.<E>
I have strict orders: no visitors without an <FC 0,128,0>Invitation<END FC>.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_PalaceGuard2_Wa.message: Grrr! Aaaargh!  What kind of devilry was that?... You, what are you doing here?! You better leave the palace! <E>
There've been some very weird things happening in the palace... but I'm not allowed to talk about it. You better leave before something awful happens to you! <E>
It's dangerous for you to remain here any longer! <E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_PalaceGuard1_Op.message: Okay, I'll let you pass... but only if you bring X <E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_PalaceGuard2_Op.message: The Pharaoh is graciously prepared to receive you now!  <E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_Mother_1stcaptu.message: Oh my goodness, you caught him! You are a most kind gentleman.<W 50>
I'm afraid there are still <FC 0,128,0><SO HT_Objective_Hel_CursedPalace_MotherNumChihuahuasLeft> doggies<END FC> left.<E>
I'm sure they must be in this building somewhere.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_Mother_WakeUp1a.message: Oh, I say! What happened? What is this strange place?<W 50>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_Mother_WakeUp1b.message: My doggies! Where have my precious doggies gone?! Oh my goodness! What am I going to do?<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_Mother_WakeUp1c.message: Please, sir! you must help me! I cannot go back home to my sister in <FC 128,64,0>Abydos<END FC> without my precious doggies!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_Mother_WakeUp1d.message: They must be nearby. I'm sure they wouldn't wander too far all on their own. Goodness knows what I would do if something happened to them!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_Mother_WakeUp1e.message: Look! Over there! It's one of my doggies, Mut!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_Mother_WakeUp1f.message: Please sir, capture him and bring him back to me.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_Mother_DogsAllF.message: Oh my goodness! Thank you ever so much. You have found all of my doggies! At last I can take them home and stop worrying.<E>
Please take this as a token of my appreciation.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_CursedPharaoh_W.message: I have been waiting so very long for the end of this wretched curse!<E>
I suppose I have you to thank for liberating me from Anubis' foul enchantment...<E>
Anubis was smarter than I thought, stopping me before I had a chance to finish my task.  <E>
Perchance, is Anubis looking for... this crown?!<E>
If you want it you'll have to catch me first! <W 60>
Ha, ha, ha! Catch me if you can!<W 60>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_PharaohsWife_Hu.message: I was convinced there was something wrong with my husband, but it wasn't him! How could I have been deceived for so long?<E>
But if that was not my husband, where is he? I do pray for his safety.<E>
If you happen to find him, please send him back to me. I don't know what I'll do without him.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_PharaohsWife_Wa.message: Oh my! How disorientating. Where am I? Oh, hello there, I don't believe I've seen you before.<E>
What in the name of Ra has happened? What in the world are these statues doing here?<E>

I hope my husband's well. He was behaving very strangely the last time I saw him.

He was obsessed about a so called Lost Temple of Heliopolis. I've never seen him like that before.
He said that the temple was hidden in the <FC 128,64,0>South Desert of Heliopolis<END FC> and that it housed an important ancient artifact.<E>

He asked me to keep this key safe, it opens a gate to the South Desert.

Please, take it. You have proved to me that you are trustworthy. Thank you for your help stranger.

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_TakeCrown1.message: Ahh... excellent! With this third crown you will soon understand their power.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_TakeCrown2.message: But there are still many perils yet to face.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_TakeCrown3.message: You are close to fulfilling your destiny...<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_TakeCrown4.message: The conclusion of the Prophecy is close at hand.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_TakeCrown5.message:
Take this Gold Ankh as a reward for your achievement.

This magic artifact has increased your health capacityby 1 Ankh and has fully replenished your health!

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_Help_GotHelianC.message:
You got the Sacred Crown of Heliopolis!

Anubis will be very eager to see this ancient artifact.

HT_Text_Hel_CursedPalace_Help_GotRoyalIn.message:
You got the Royal Invitation!

This official document invites you for a meeting with the Pharaoh of Heliopolis.

HT_Text_Hel_Dungeon_Archeologist_Intro02.message: You must succeed! It has been my lifelong dream to learn the secret of the <FC 0,128,0>Rosetta Stone<END FC>.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Dungeon_Archeologist_StonePi.message:
Hello again, dear boy. Wait a minute... is that? Can it be? My lord, it is! You have found one of the Rosetta Stone Pieces!

Well done, my boy! If you can find the remaining Pieces then I may be able to restore the stone and unravel the secret it holds!
You only need <FC 0,128,0><SO HT_Objective_Hel_Dungeon_ArcheologistPiecesRemaining> Pieces<END FC> more and we can try and learn the secret of the stone!<E>
You only need <FC 0,128,0><SO HT_Objective_Hel_Dungeon_ArcheologistPiecesRemaining> Piece<END FC> more and we can try and learn the secret of the stone!<E>

That's it! You've done it! You have found all of the Rosetta Stone Pieces!

Now I must try and reassemble the pieces of the legendary Rosetta Stone and try to understand its secret.
Will you allow me to take the <FC 0,128,0>Rosetta Stone Pieces<END FC>?<N>  <B 1> Yes<N>  <B 2> No<E>
Alas, they are yours to keep if you wish. But you will not find anyone more capable than I of learning the secret of the stone. To you they are quite useless.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Dungeon_Help_DoorChains.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>Heavy chains are preventing<N>you from opening this door.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Hel_Dungeon_Help_SkeletonClue.message: <CNTR>---[ The <FC 0,128,0>Bones of the Undead<END FC> must be offered in order from head to toe, from left to right ]---<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Dungeon_Help_GotBone01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>You got a <FC 0,128,0>Skeletal Skull<END FC>!<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Hel_Dungeon_Help_GotBone02.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>You got a <FC 0,128,0>Skeletal Pelvis<END FC>!<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Hel_Dungeon_Help_GotBone03.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>You got a <FC 0,128,0>Skeletal Arm<END FC>!<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Hel_Dungeon_Help_GotBone04.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>You got a <FC 0,128,0>Skeletal Leg<END FC>!<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Hel_Dungeon_Help_ShrinePromptTak.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText>Take the item from the shrine?<N>  <B 1> Yes<N>  <B 2> No<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Hel_Dungeon_Help_ShrineNoItem.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>This is a shrine for an item of some kind.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Hel_Dungeon_Archeologist_Present.message: Greetings, young man. I am Urbain the Archeologist. <E>
I have spent most of my life in search of the <FC 0,128,0>Rosetta Stone<END FC>. Obviously not in my formative years. <E>
I have come so far but this task is impossible. Now I'll never discover the secret of the <FC 0,128,0>Rosetta Stone<END FC>. <E>
Please, follow me. Let me show you something very interesting. <E>

These ancient writings on the wall here say that the stone was shattered into six pieces, and that the pieces were hidden inside this temple.

However, it also says they are guarded by ferocious beasts.
I am too old and frail to venture inside the temple. Alas, I shall die without realizing my dream.<E>
But wait! You are young and strong, as I think I once was! Go forth into the temple, if you have the stomach for adventure.<E>
If you find the <FC 0,128,0>Rosetta Stone Pieces<END FC>, return them to me, and make an old man happy.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Dungeon_Archeologist_Complet.message:
Excellent, my boy! Excellent! Now I must get back to my tent in the Bedouin Outpost and get to work.

You must come and visit me to check on my findings. The Bedouin Outpost is easy to find if you approach through the underwater passage from the Cursed Palace.
Before I go, I want you to take these <FC 0,128,0>Underwater Projectiles<END FC>. They should prove a useful tool on your journey back to the <FC 128,64,0>Bedouin Outpost<END FC>.<E>
Don't forget to visit me to check on my findings! I hope to see you soon, young chap!<E>
Alas, they are yours to keep if you wish, but you will not find anyone more capable than I of unraveling the secret of the stone.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_WallSection1_Help_BlowpipeTa.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><N><CNTR>Targets like this can be shot with the <FC 0,128,0>Blowpipe<END FC>.<ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Hel_WallSection2_Help_KaAnkh01.message:
This is a Ka Ankh Firing Point.

They can be used to magically transportyou to the location of a nearby Ka Ankh.

Press while standing on thefiring point to enter first person mode.

HT_Text_Hel_WallSection2_Help_KaAnkh02.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><CNTR>Aim and shoot the glowing top of a nearby <FC 0,128,0>Ka Ankh<END FC> and<N>you will be magically transported to that location.<E><ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Hel_DarkArea1_Anubis_Presentatio.message: So, you are Sphinx. How disappointing. I was expecting so much more.<E>

I know why you have come here. You wish to attempt that which many others before you have failed.

If you wish to free the people of the Cursed Palace you must prove to me that you are worthy. Your first test will be one of courage and faith...
Come, Sphinx. Come closer to me. Do not be intimidated by this deadly chasm of lava.<E>
Haha! That was merely a party trick in comparison to the full power I possess. Your second test will be one of skill and technique...<E>

You must capture <FC 0,128,0>3 Fire Armadillos<END FC> from the area you have just passed through. Take these <FC 0,128,0>Capture Beetles<END FC>. They are the tool you will require. Use them wisely.<E>
Prove to me that you are worthy and I will grant the freedom of some of the <FC 128,64,0>Cursed Palace<END FC> inhabitants.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_DarkArea1_Anubis_LizardMissi.message: Ahh, you succeeded! I expected you to fail like your friend Horus. It seems you are made of sterner stuff.<E>
Very well! These <FC 0,128,0>Curse Stones<END FC> will free two of the inhabitants of the <FC 128,64,0>Cursed Palace<END FC>.<E>

Now you not only have the power to capture any enemy, you can also release Fire Armadillos and Slim Burbles.

These creatures are powerful tools that will aid you in your quest. Use them wisely.

I may call upon you again in the future, Sphinx...
At last, you have returned! I have a much more dangerous quest for you to undertake if you wish to free more of the <FC 128,64,0>Cursed Palace<END FC> inhabitants.<E>
In the island city of <FC 128,64,0>Abydos<END FC> is a sacred artifact which I entrusted to the Mayor many years ago; the <FC 0,128,0>Sacred Crown of Abydos<END FC>.<E>

The Mayor resides in the city's Council Chambers. Convince him to return the Crown to me and I will give you the Curse Stones you desire.

The portal beneath you will take you to Abydos if you have the Abydos Portal Amulet. Farewell, Sphinx.

HT_Text_Hel_DarkArea1_Anubis_GoToSakkara.message: Ahh... you have returned! I was beginning to think the challenge had proved beyond your capabilities! You have my artifact?<E>
So the crown was in the possession of a demon? Hmmm... this is indeed an ominous revelation.<E>
If Set has attempted to steal the <FC 0,128,0>Sacred Crown of Abydos<END FC>, then it is certain that he is also seeking the <FC 0,128,0>Sacred Crown of Uruk<END FC>.<E>
I will stay true to my word. These <FC 0,128,0>Curse Stones<END FC> will free more of the inhabitants of the <FC 128,64,0>Cursed Palace<END FC>.<E>
However, you must find the <FC 0,128,0>Sacred Crown of Uruk<END FC> and return it to me before Set lays his hands on it.<E>
These <FC 0,128,0>Acid Darts<END FC> should help you in your quest for the crown.<E>
Good luck on your new quest! You're going to need it!<W 90>

HT_Text_Hel_DarkArea1_Anubis_OsirisVsSet.message: Excellent! You brought the <FC 0,128,0>Sacred Crown of Uruk<END FC>! You are proving that you are a true hero!<E>
But you are not yet strong enough to defeat Set! I am glad that you did not confront him in <FC 128,64,0>Uruk<END FC>. He would have destroyed you with ease.<E>
Alas, time is running out! Set is close to his ultimate goal of destroying his brother Osiris!<E>
There was a time when only one God ruled over us. That God was known by the name... Ra.<E>
He personified both good and evil - the darkness and the light in one!<E>
Osiris was the light and Set was the dark. They ruled in harmony; it was a time of peace.<E>
But Set became greedy - as is in the nature of evil - and turned against Osiris.<E>
He attacked his brother in an attempt to become the single force in the universe... the power of evil!<E>
If Set gathers every crown that controls the Eye and destroys Osiris, the shadow of evil will be cast upon us for eternity!<E>

Set is gathering strength while Osiris is weak, on the verge of death.

That you were able to stop the ritual he was using to spread the shadow of evil is perhaps why we are still alive.
Now you must go to the <FC 128,64,0>Cursed Palace<END FC> and retrieve the <FC 0,128,0>Sacred Crown of Heliopolis<END FC>.<E>
These <FC 0,128,0>Curse Stones<END FC> will help you free the Pharaoh. I am sure he will be very pleased to see you! Muahaha!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_DarkArea1_Anubis_HeliopolisC.message: You have brought the <FC 0,128,0>Sacred Crown of Heliopolis<END FC>! I knew that you would succeed!<E>
Hmm, and also you have brought the very same Set's crown. <E>
Congratulations, Sphinx. This is a magnificent achievement to finally give Osiris enough power to manifest once again! <E>
Behold his mighty power and splendor! <E>
I am the light of Ra, defender of the good and innocent, enemy of shadow, and the founder of the <FC 0,128,0>Ancient Prophecy of Ra<END FC>. A prophecy which is rapidly drawing to an end.<E>
I built this wall eons ago to prevent my own destruction at the hands of my brother Set. All this time, my guardian Anubis has protected the wall from Set's onslaught.<E>
Cursing the palace was necessary to protect <FC 128,64,0>Heliopolis<END FC> but now the inhabitants are free and the demon destroyed.<E>
You are the Chosen One who has fulfilled the Ancient Prophecy, but the ultimate outcome of your heroic actions is uncertain...<E>
Sphinx, there is one last quest you must undertake before you truly fulfill the <FC 0,128,0>Ancient Prophecy of Ra<END FC>...<E>
You must travel to the <FC 128,64,0>Castle of Uruk<END FC> and fight Set in a final battle for the crown! Anubis must stay and defend the wall! You are our only chance!<E>
I will transport you to <FC 128,64,0>Uruk<END FC>... but you must jump into the lava!<E>
Sir! Using Set's own ethereal canals to transport him to the castle?! This is folly! That is much too dangerous!<E>
We have no choice! Set is getting stronger by the second! Now, Sphinx... NOW!!!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_DarkArea1_Anubis_LizardMissi.message: Are you so feeble that you cannot even capture <FC 0,128,0>3 Fire Armadillos<END FC>?<E>

I warned you about using the Capture Beetles wisely and yet you have squandered them.

I will grant you 20 more but if you do not use them to capture 3 Fire Armadillos I will be most unimpressed.

HT_Text_Hel_DarkArea1_Anubis_GenericMeet.message: I'm certain that fate will bring you to me again in the future, but now I have nothing more to give you.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_DarkArea1_Anubis_AbydosCrown.message: You should not delay. There are other more sinister forces also looking for the <FC 0,128,0>Sacred Crown of Abydos<END FC>.<E>

Finally, you have returned with the crown! Congratulations young hero, you have far surpassed my expectations.

I will stay true to my word and release more of the inhabitants of the Cursed Palace.

However, I feel it is time to reveal to you the truth behind my sending you in search of the crown.

There are other crowns in different worlds, and the evil god Set is trying to recover them for himself.

We cannot let this happen! You must find the crowns before he does or the consequences could be devastating.

In the jungle world of Sakkara you should find the ancient Sakkarian Crown.

You should leave immediately. Good luck.

HT_Text_Hel_DarkArea1_Anubis_SakkaraCrow.message: Do not delay! If Set finds the <FC 0,128,0>Crown of Uruk<END FC> first, there is no telling what could happen!<E>

Finally, you have returned with the crown! I knew that you would not fail.

As promised I will release the remaining inhabitants of the Cursed Palace.

The Sacred Crown of Heliopolis is within the palace, but I urge caution. The Pharaoh is not an easy man to deal with.

HT_Text_Hel_DarkArea1_Anubis_HeliopolisC.message: Do not delay. The Pharaoh and his crown await in the <FC 128,64,0>Cursed Palace<END FC>.<E>

You have performed with great courage and strength, hero, but now you must face your toughest challenge.

Set is already in possession of the Sacred Crown of Uruk in the devastated world of Uruk.

The only way he can be stopped now is to travel to Uruk and destroy him once and for all.

You should prepare yourself for the arduous journey ahead. When you are ready, use this Portal Amulet to travel to Uruk.

Good luck, young hero.

HT_Text_Hel_DarkArea1_Anubis_UrukCrown_N.message: The more you linger, the stronger Set becomes. It is unwise to delay much longer.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_DarkArea1_Anubis_UrukCrown_A.message: Very well, the portal is open. Good luck.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_DarkArea1_Anubis_UrukCrown_D.message: The more you linger, the stronger Set becomes. It is unwise to delay much longer.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_DarkArea2_Help_KaAnkh01.message:
This is a Ka Ankh Firing Point.

They can be used to magically transportyou to the location of a nearby Ka Ankh.

Press while standing on thefiring point to enter first person mode.

HT_Text_Hel_DarkArea2_Help_KaAnkh02.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText><CNTR>Aim and shoot the glowing top of a nearby <FC 0,128,0>Ka Ankh<END FC> and<N>you will be magically transported to that location.<E><ES HT_Text_ES_E_HelpText><E>

HT_Text_Hel_DarkArea3_Teleport_Prompt01.message: <ES HT_Text_ES_S_HelpText>Use the magical teleport?<N>  <B 2> No<N>  <B 1> Yes<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Imhotep_Akaria1a.message: At last you have arrived! I was wondering if you would return at all!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Imhotep_Akaria1b.message: I didn't expect such complications in <FC 128,64,0>Abydos<END FC>. It appears that the forces of darkness are moving faster than I anticipated.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Imhotep_Akaria1c.message: If you had not intervened, I am sure that eventually <FC 128,64,0>Abydos<END FC> would have suffered a similar fate to that of <FC 128,64,0>Heliopolis<END FC>.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Imhotep_Akaria1d.message: Now that you have interfered with his plans, the enemy will be watching you more closely, striving harder to hinder your progress.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Imhotep_Akaria1e.message: You must be prepared for the more difficult and dangerous journey that lies ahead. I have confidence that you will rise to the challenges that you will face.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Imhotep_Akaria1f.message: You should go to Anubis now. He may have information about the enemy that I lack. Use your <FC 0,128,0>Portal Amulet<END FC> to get to his tower more quickly.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Imhotep_Akaria1g.message: You should go to Anubis now. He may have information about the enemy that I lack. Use this <FC 0,128,0>Portal Amulet<END FC> to get to his tower more quickly.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Imhotep_BookDead_1a.message:
Sphinx! It is good to see you again my friend! You have faced many deadly dangers and challenges and it is clear to me that you are no longer an inexperienced apprentice.

Ahh... I see that you now have the Shield of Osiris; what a perfect companion for the Blade of Osiris.

HT_Text_Hel_Imhotep_BookDead_1a1.message:
Wielding these is a fine achievement indeed, for they will serve you well in your coming adventure.

Horus has already been here, but he would not wait for you. His impatience is equal to your enthusiasm.

HT_Text_Hel_Imhotep_BookDead_1b.message: It seems that you have been busy on your voyage; that <FC 0,128,0>Canopic Vase<END FC> is a most interesting artifact.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Imhotep_BookDead_1c.message: It has been many years since I have seen one like this... But I might still be able to help release the soul that is trapped inside... <E>

HT_Text_Hel_Imhotep_BookDead_1d.message: I see a place far to the north, inside a castle in the land of inferno; the land of <FC 128,64,0>Uruk<END FC>... Aha! I see the Prince of <FC 128,64,0>Luxor<END FC>... Tutankhamen.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Imhotep_BookDead_1d1a.message: I will release the soul from the <FC 0,128,0>Canopic Vase<END FC> and send it back to its owner...<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Imhotep_BookDead_1d1b.message: His body lies within the <FC 128,64,0>Castle of Uruk<END FC>! Once revived, he could be very useful; nobody has ever managed to get inside. I have an ominous feeling about events there...<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Imhotep_BookDead_1e.message: Yes, I can see him now. It is Tutankhamen, the Prince of <FC 128,64,0>Luxor<END FC>. He has been mummified, but has not yet crossed into the afterlife. Tutankhamen, wake up! Wake up!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Imhotep_BookDead_1f.message: No living thing can travel beyond the fierce protection of the castle. We will need to send a magical entity...<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Imhotep_BookDead_1g.message: This basket is perfect. Nobody will suspect a thing.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Imhotep_BookDead_1h.message: By the power of Osiris, instill this basket with the illusion of life!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Imhotep_Connect_Chapter_Imho.message: It's one of the stolen jewels of <FC 128,64,0>Abydos<END FC>! <E>
I knew something suspicious was going on. We must find out exactly what treachery is afoot...<E>
Ahh, this is very interesting... the Prince has managed to find the lost <FC 0,128,0>Wings of Ibis<END FC> within the castle.<E>
It is an ancient magical artifact that was stolen a long time ago. It gives its owner the agility of a bird, enabling them to jump greater heights and longer distances.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Imhotep_Connect_Chapter_Bask.message: Keep Bas-Ket with you now, as well as these items. I am sure they will be very useful in your quest.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Imhotep_Connect_Chapter_Imho.message:
If you had the Book of the Dead, you could send Bas-Ket to Tutankhamen when you find a Canopic Vase.

I have a feeling the book may be in the Cursed Palace somewhere, so perhaps you should go and speak to Anubis about the palace's unfortunate inhabitants.

Horus already left to visit him, but I see your fate and his are diverging now.

HT_Text_Hel_Imhotep_Basket1a.message: Outstanding work Sphinx! You have the last two Sacred Crowns!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Imhotep_Basket1b.message: You should take them to Anubis but be warned...<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Imhotep_Basket1c.message: I sense that your quest is nearing its conclusion and once you have departed for the final battle, there will be no turning back.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Imhotep_Basket1d.message: If you have any unfinished business, you should take care of it before you visit Anubis. Good luck Sphinx.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Imhotep_Sakkara1a.message: Sphinx! Welcome back! The situation in <FC 128,64,0>Uruk Islands<END FC> was very dire indeed.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Imhotep_Sakkara1c.message: I see that Set himself was present at the ceremony. This is a disturbing development.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Imhotep_Sakkara1d.message: If he had known of your presence there I am sure he would have destroyed you. He is becoming more powerful as every moment passes.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Imhotep_Sakkara1e.message: Despite such adversity, you managed to prevail and stop Set from completing his domination of <FC 128,64,0>Uruk<END FC>. You are indeed proving to be a most worthy apprentice.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Imhotep_Sakkara1h.message: You should inform Anubis of Set's involvement. He will be most interested to learn that his nemesis has his plans for domination back in motion.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_SunShrine_Imhotep01.message: Sphinx! You should visit Anubis by passing through <FC 128,64,0>Great Wall Entrance I<END FC>. He may have some answers about what happened to the poor people of the <FC 128,64,0>Cursed Palace<END FC>.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_SunShrine_Imhotep02.message: You should not keep Anubis waiting Sphinx! Complete his quest and he may have some valuable information!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_SunShrine_Imhotep03.message: Sphinx! So, Anubis is seeking the <FC 0,128,0>Sacred Crown of Abydos<END FC>. I wonder what he could want with that ancient artifact?<E>

HT_Text_Hel_SunShrine_Imhotep04.message: Sphinx, you should take the <FC 0,128,0>Sacred Crown of Abydos<END FC> to Anubis without delay!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_SunShrine_Imhotep05.message: Now it's the <FC 0,128,0>Sacred Crown of Uruk<END FC> Anubis is seeking? This obsession with the sacred crowns makes me uneasy. I urge caution Sphinx.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_SunShrine_Imhotep06.message: Sphinx, you should take the <FC 0,128,0>Sacred Crown of Uruk<END FC> to Anubis without delay!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_SunShrine_Imhotep07.message: Sphinx! It seems that Anubis will not be satisfied until he has all the crowns in his possession. With the <FC 0,128,0>Sacred Crown of Heliopolis<END FC> his collection will be almost complete.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_SunShrine_Imhotep08.message: Sphinx, do not keep Anubis waiting! He has requested your presence in his tower.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_SunShrine_Imhotep09.message: Sphinx! It was Anubis who was responsible for cursing the palace inhabitants, just as the Helians decreed. I wonder what could motivate such a drastic action?<E>

HT_Text_Hel_SunShrine_ImhotepCandles01.message: Really Sphinx, I think you have more important things to do than to go around destroying candles!<E>

HT_Text_Hel_SunShrine_ImhotepCandles02.message: Are you happy now all the candles are destroyed? I would expect that sort of childish behavior from Horus but not from you Sphinx. <E>

HT_Text_Hel_SunShrine_ImhotepCandles03.message: It's good to see you have your priorities in order. I'm sure destroying candles is going to help you immensely in your quest.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Imhotep_PortalAmulet01.message: Sphinx! I have some very interesting news. Anubis has informed me that he wants to see you in his tower.<E>

HT_Text_Hel_Imhotep_PortalAmulet02.message: Take this <FC 0,128,0>Portal Amulet<END FC>, it will allow you to use the portal behind me to travel directly to <FC 128,64,0>Anubis Tower<END FC>.<E>
